Reviews.Title: “Excellent Location and Friendly Hotel”
Reviews.Author: Adnan D Posted by an Easytobook.com traveler
Reviews.Content: stayed 2 nights excellent location 15 minutes tram central amstel stations close restaurants bars museum garden 5 minutes walk reception nice friendly guided enjoyed amsterdam didnt tasted breakfast little bed shower ok overall positive

Reviews.Title: “hotel is covered with fleas”

Reviews.Content: thanks 2 night stay hotel particularly 254 home covered flea bites visit doctor warned hotel experiences breakfast dog walking kitchen staff breakfast probably hygienic

Reviews.Content: night stay hotel breakfast positives ares improved staying hotel situated lovely quiet street gorgeous park tram links round corner straight amsterdam city centre found staying close tram fares relatively cheap variety offer breakfast eat hotel staff polite helpful clean described double impressed size windows net curtains blackout curtains little cold heating happy hotel runs shuttle service straight airport found handy flight morning shower clean plenty towels shower wash shower temperamental temperature gage lock door looked recently broken hadnt repaired door appeared lock properly left little nervous security report repaired time left home breakfast time 7 1030 flight hotel staff allowed breakfast 630 am usual tv satellite hair dryer coffee facilities iron recommend taking travel iron staying hotel pleasant stay definately stay

Reviews.Title: “Good location but disappointing hotel”
Reviews.Author: Firemunchkin
Reviews.Content: husband relaxing break loved amsterdam stay hotel decent sized double clean surface dusting bed linen none furniture matched properly 2 chairs actually holes tears leather bed comfortable beautiful view vondelpark floor ceiling windows shame steamed easily morning nice theyd remembered white curtain privacy hanging hanger door hotel apartments wasnt fridge cold outside window sill outside windows handy diet coke 1 pillow spares blankets info leaflets disturb notice tv bbc1 bathroom level cleanliness tissue box looked hadnt cleaned months shower cubicle huge shower head meant little move getting wet yes shower dont wash hair day annoyingly forced wasnt pleasant experience showering water wasnt powerful streams thin sparse difficult rinse hair properly equally impossible lather body properly spray water reaching entirety cubicle temperature impossible hot touching controls odd toilet roll holder situated couldnt properly sit loo scratching yourself body wash hand wash provided hotel loo roll rough hairdryer useless freezing outside forced wash hair towels wasnt heated towel rail shower mat floor unfortunately noisiest creaking floor outside hear past little sound proofing woken times night passing guests lift didnt ground floor basement call appeared attempts fixed wifi â‚¬8 day free computer lobby handy breakfast disappointing cooked breakfast except scrambled eggs bit grey hard boiled eggs diy toast array processed hams cheeses packet croissantspastries flakes yoghurt tinned fruit salad concentrated fruit juice theres lot quality id expect pay â‚¬10 particularly note sign stating food breakfast finish breakfast upstairs whilst showering ive paid able thanks positive id tea rarely hotels hotel staff helpful courteous location close tram links lovely quiet street close park isolated complaints isnt bad collectively stay hotel little stressful relaxing shame

Reviews.Title: “Pleasant and Affordable”
Reviews.Author: Chloe714
Reviews.Content: booked hotel girls trip amsterdam taking account negative reviews werent expecting experience budget break didnt break bank pleasantly surprised thoroughly enjoyed stay hotel close museum district easily accessible schipol airport train central station picked tram speedy affordable travel arrived walking didnt tram stop allowed hotel block prestigious streets amsterdam shops couldnt afford hotel walking distance museums van gogh leidesplein lots bars restaurants 5 minutes via park arrival check happy store bags lady reception map directions local market albert market enjoyable afternoon returned check triple spacious actually containing single beds clean bathroom plenty towels replenished daily table tv bedside tables wardrobe throughout stay staff helpful willing assist directions information various tourist attractions breakfast variety fruit juices cereal bread pastry meats cheeses admit im picky traveller dont art technology brand furniture cleanliness space helpful staff happily stay

Reviews.Title: “Amsterdamage”
Reviews.Author: MCRAD16
Reviews.Content: weve spent week hotel advised friend due location night spent double approaching front desk morning happy change double size extra cost breakfast included costing decent fare believe greet talk staff respect theyll help main museums amsterdam close tram close upmarket shopping street dream walk street overall hotel satisfactory location

Reviews.Title: “Poor quality ,never again ... :-(”
Reviews.Author: Starlight56
Reviews.Content: booked via bottom barrel hotel dropped near central station amsterdam realised hotel waswe finally arrived reception gutted below average hotel reception told check told leave breakfast dirty laundry return 2pm check inwe 2pm proceeded 2nd floorthe passages ect badly upgrading worn depressing basics including en suite silicone mouldy looked dirty shower crack wall tiles broken door handle double bed finebut bedding didnt look curtains creased sad sugar tea coffeeno milk 2 chairs sadly plastic covers ripped edges continental breakfast reasonable dirty laundry bit putting scrambled eggs container recommend hotel enjoy stay hope management read reviews hotel renovated redecorated

Reviews.Title: “Maybe if you like FREEZING COLD showers...”
Reviews.Author: iamtechnicolor
Reviews.Content: spent night boyfriend moderately clean looked curtains stained looked mold size tiny isnt huge deal arent picky worst booked double bed confirmed checked twin beds pushed foster romantic mood walls paper thin hear people late night morning 930 hotel hot water hotel able hot shower wake call extreme budget pennies worth wasnt worth â£70 paid

Reviews.Title: “Fantastic Trip and wonderful treatment at Hotel”
Reviews.Author: Buddy1949123
Reviews.Content: travelled party arrival hotel offered choice 2 hospitality shown reception staffespecially hotel culdesac entrance vondelpark thru walk entertainment bars restaurants wonderful stay hotel constant hot water clean towels plus breakfast satisfy tastes recommend wishes stay nice easy access attractions

Reviews.Title: “Nice little hotel - Bad reviews undeserved from my experience.”
Reviews.Author: HopscotchJunkie
Reviews.Content: enjoyed stay didnt experience complaining booked single advance arrived late getting towards midnight double singles fine perfect size people size people suitcases uncomfortably sign alleged rats breakfast plentiful buffetstyle selection rolls toast cheese meats eggs cereals yoghurt etc lot expected price ive pricier hotels setup day hotel nice location vondelpark shopping street noise centre looks fair distance map 35 minutes walk probably reduced minutes id bothered try tram network prefer walking didnt theres nightlife directly hotel 1015 minute walk southeast de pijp brown cafes quiet local coffeeshops club media northeast leidseplein touristy bars north edge jordaan brown cafes quieter coffeeshops la favourite 1e hotel solo quiet city break id happy stay honesty probably probably recommended larger amsterdam rld nightlife experience thats loss

Reviews.Title: “Great location, comfy and clean rooms, not deserving of bad reviews!”

Reviews.Content: stayed partner hotel city garden 3 nights october dubious trip bad reviews bed reviews larger wasnt concerned people hotel staff desk efficient booked taxi airport 5am information restaurants transport nearby spoke average english breakfast lovely including french toast rolls ham cheese juices scrambled egg cleaned daily beds kettle teacups washed daily providing teabags sugar etc vending machine lobby midnight drinks snacks brilliant location near beautiful park 2 minute walk cashpoint tram stops 5 minutes hard rock cafe wagamamas 1015 mins centre close designer shops complaints wardrobes fine size 34 night stay 4 hangers drawer wouldnt space weeks clothes safe provided lock defeating door hard windows meaning barrier stop falling street floor glad children minor setbacks reccomend hotel

Reviews.Title: “Excellent value for money and NOT deserving of the bad reviews”
Reviews.Author: jjhousen
Reviews.Content: booked hotel spouse teenage son teenage twin nephews arrival front office person efficient efficiency mistaken rudeness son nephews triple downstairs immediately below kitchen morning noise woke frequently switch courteously provided extremely pleased service wifi capability bedding assistance front desk genuinely honestly received value money definitely stay location close main trams stops boys absolutely loved changed inclined write review bad reviews view totally unjustifiable

Reviews.Title: “BEWARE MICE THREAT AND ALSO BED BUGS!!!!!!”
Reviews.Author: caz5062
Reviews.Content: stayed hotel city garden october 2010 booked 2 triple arrival check flight amsterdam store luggage check 2pm arrived hotel 2pm freaked checking hotel mice imagine happy girls confronted reception tells control worry seriously help worry walking hotel front customers disgust looked ok fair shower etc 2 minutes leaving knocked door check agreed nervously nerve bring bedroom check mouse trap bed trying mice entire visit freaked seen mouse hotel dont bring check trap paying guests sitting watching bad idea hairdyer broken light didnt window sill cracked broken window tied wire broken overall recommend hotel pay price paid expect thats clean looking hole visit mice bathroom door wouldnt lock seen reviews booked hotel bed bugs thank god didnt recommend hotel fir stay alot little bit youd youd save staying hotel youd spend taxis trams red light district

Reviews.Title: “Too expensive for what you get”
Reviews.Author: ScotlandSjs
Reviews.Content: broken shower door 4 beds 4 people space move tv friends staying move due shower nice corridor maid cleaning corridors grubby carpets stained bar pictured website apparently photos line breakfast staff friendly hotel location galleries park considering cost 200 euros night am

Reviews.Title: “Nice affordable hotel”
Reviews.Author: KY_Chan_54
Reviews.Content: son stayed night 1015 mins tram city centre nice vondel park close restaurants shops museums reception basic service friendly bit apprehensive reading previous reviews found twin smallish comfortable clean quiet selfcontained breakfast surprisingly food normally continental breakfast understand amsterdam expensive city hotel value money pay stay recommend value money

Reviews.Title: “Lumpy pillows and noisy neighbours”
Reviews.Author: Siriolhj
Reviews.Content: hostel hotel caters youth budget market walls ceilings thin dont expect sleep getting 330am window failed shut issue july mosquitoes night youd hope theyd fix weather positively location reception staff friendly

Reviews.Title: “One of the Worst Hotels”
Reviews.Author: LovetoTravel711
Reviews.Content: people reception rude booked quad people key person key slightest bit efficient smelled urine mold growing bathroom night loud front hotel people smoke cigarette smoke maid didnt clean day clean towels overall worst hotels stayed dont 3 star rating

Reviews.Title: “Not one complaint, Nice hotel, Good location, Great for seeing Amsterdam”
Reviews.Author: ANNE1979
Reviews.Content: stayed hotel recently mice pictures reviews stayed double friends stayed larger condition clean double compared larger dont spend extra money adequate flat screen tv hairdryer teacoffee facilties phone alarm clock location seeing amsterdam 10 minute walk hotel nightlife 3 minute walk nearest tram stop brings main stops ie anne franks dam square central station reached foot walking distance tram option break amsterdam quiet walking getting foot cant fault amsterdam expensive street amsterdam tiffanys gucci louis vuitton noise streets night lady reception stay found nice helpfull def recommend friend

Reviews.Title: “nice hotel. Good location by a park and short walk to most things.”
Reviews.Author: flashbackunlimited
Reviews.Content: wife stopped amsterdam 3 days layover india loved amsterdam january hotel half block major park blocks canals amsterdam hard rock shops clean effeciently laid buffet breakfast amazing weekend paid 90 average internet rate dropped 50 week staff helpful free internet
